description.tchinese: 用一發磁軌砲殺死兩個以上的敵人
description.german: Töte mindestens zwei Feinde mit einem einzigen Railgun-Geschoss
description.italian: Uccidi due o più nemici con un singolo colpo di railgun
description.brazilian: Mate dois ou mais inimigos com um único Projétil do Canhão Eletromagnético
description.schinese: 用一发电磁炮炮弹杀死2个或以上敌人
description.spanish: Mata a dos o más enemigos con un solo proyectil de cañón de riel
description.russian: Убить двух или более врагов одним выстрелом из рельсотрона
description.turkish: Tek bir Raylı Top mermisiyle iki veya daha fazla düşmanı öldür
description.polish: Zabij co najmniej dwóch wrogów jednym pociskiem działa kinetycznego
description.koreana: 레일건 발사체 하나로 둘 이상의 적을 죽이십시오
description.japanese: レールガンの弾1発で複数の敵を倒す

description.english: Kill an enemy with an Overhead Monitor
description.tchinese: 用頭頂監視器殺死一名敵人
description.german: Töte einen Feind mit einem fallenden Monitor
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico con un monitor sospeso
description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo com um Monitor Suspenso
description.schinese: 用头顶监控器杀死1个敌人
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo con un monitor sobre la cabeza
description.turkish: Başüstü Monitör ile bir düşmanı öldür
description.polish: Zabij wroga monitorem sufitowym
description.japanese: オーバーヘッドモニターで敵を倒す

displayName.spanish: Bajo la influencia a lo bestia

description.english: Kill 10 enemies while under the effects of the Berserk Combat Booster
description.tchinese: 在狂暴戰鬥增強劑的效力下殺死 10 個敵人
description.german: Töte 10 Feinde, während du unter der Wirkung des Berserker-Kampfverstärkers stehst
description.italian: Uccidi 10 nemici sotto gli effetti del Cerotto Berserk
description.brazilian: Mate 10 inimigos enquanto estiver sob os efeitos do Reforço de Combate Berserk
description.schinese: 在狂暴战斗药剂的效果下杀死10个敌人
description.spanish: Mata a 10 enemigos bajo los efectos de la mejora de combate Berserker
description.russian: Убить 10 врагов под действием боевого усилителя Берсерк
description.turkish: Coşturucu Çatışma Güçlendirici etkileri altındayken 10 düşmanı öldür
description.polish: Zabij 10 wrogów, będąc pod wpływem wzmocnienia bojowego Berserk
description.koreana: 버서크 전투 부스터 효과를 얻은 상태로 적 10명을 죽이십시오
description.japanese: バーサーク・コンバット・ブースターの効果中に敵を10体倒す

displayName.english: Somebody Set Up Us The Bomb
displayName.german: Jemand stellte uns die Bombe auf
displayName.italian: Somebody Set Up Us The Bomb
displayName.schinese: 来个人帮我们设置炸弹
displayName.japanese: 誰かが我々に爆弾を設置した

description.english: Kill three or more enemies with a single explosive weapon
description.tchinese: 用一個炸彈型武器殺死三個以上的敵人
description.german: Töte mindestens drei Feinde mit einer einzigen Explosion
description.italian: Uccidi tre o più nemici con una singola arma esplosiva
description.brazilian: Mate três ou mais inimigos com uma única arma explosiva
description.schinese: 用一个爆炸武器杀死3个或以上敌人
description.spanish: Mata a tres o más enemigos con una sola arma explosiva
description.russian: Убить трех и более врагов одним взрывным оружием
description.turkish: Tek bir patlayıcı silahla üç veya daha fazla düşmanı öldür
description.polish: Zabij co najmniej trzech wrogów pojedynczym ładunkiem wybuchowym
description.koreana: 폭발형 무기 하나로 셋 이상의 적을 죽이십시오
description.japanese: 3体以上の敵を爆発物系の武器1発で倒す

description.english: Defeat Edward Diego while en route to the Life Pods
description.tchinese: 前往救生艙的路上擊敗愛德華·迪亞哥
description.german: Besiege Edward Diego auf dem Weg zu den Rettungskapseln
description.italian: Sconfiggi Edward Diego andando verso le capsula di salvataggio
description.brazilian: Derrote Edward Diego enquanto estiver a caminho das Cápsulas de Fuga
description.schinese: 在前往救生舱的途中击败爱德华·蒂亚戈
description.spanish: Derrota a Edward Diego de camino a las cápsulas salvavidas
description.russian: Победите Эдварда Диего на пути к спасательным капсулам
description.turkish: Kaçış Kapsüllerine giderken Edward Diego'yu mağlup et
description.polish: Pokonaj Edwarda Diego, gdy będzie w drodze do kapsuł ratunkowych
description.koreana: 탈출 포드로 가는 동안 에드워드 디에고를 쓰러뜨리십시오
description.japanese: ライフポッドへ向かう間にエドワード・ディエゴを倒す

description.english: Kill Edward Diego with the Laser Rapier
description.tchinese: 用雷射刺劍擊殺愛德華·迪亞哥
description.german: Töte Edward Diego mit dem Laserrapier
description.italian: Uccidi Edward Diego con la spada laser
description.brazilian: Mate Edward Diego com a Espada de Laser
description.schinese: 用激光剑杀死爱德华·蒂亚戈
description.spanish: Mata a Edward Diego con el estoque láser
description.turkish: Edward Diego'yu Lazer Işın Kılıcı ile öldür
description.polish: Zabij Edwarda Diego rapierem laserowym
description.japanese: レーザーレイピアでエドワード・ディエゴを倒す

description.english: Defeat all of the Cortex Reavers on Citadel Station
description.tchinese: 在要塞太空站擊敗所有大腦掠奪者
description.german: Besiege alle Cortex-Räuber an Bord der Citadel Station
description.italian: Sconfiggi tutti i Predatori corticali sulla Stazione Citadel

description.schinese: 击败堡垒空间站里的所有机械甲虫
description.spanish: Derrota a todos los saqueadores de Córtex en Estación Ciudadela
description.russian: Победить всех мозгокрадов на станции Цитадель
description.turkish: Hisar İstasyonundaki tüm Korteks Yağmacılarını mağlup et
description.polish: Pokonaj wszystkich Cortex Reaverów na stacji Cytadela
description.koreana: 우주 정거장 시타델을 배회하는 코텍스 리버를 하나도 남김없이 쓰러뜨리십시오
description.japanese: シタデル・ステーションのコルテックス・リーバーを全て倒す

description.english: Destroy all of SHODAN’s cameras and CPU Nodes
description.tchinese: 摧毀所有撒旦的攝影機和 CPU 節點
description.german: Zerstöre alle Kameras und Prozessorknoten von SHODAN
description.italian: Distruggi tutte le telecamere e i Centri CPU di SHODAN

description.schinese: 破坏SHODAN的全部摄像头和CPU节点
description.spanish: Destruye todas las cámaras y nodos CPU de SHODAN
description.russian: Уничтожить все камеры и ЦП-узлы SHODAN
description.turkish: SHODAN'ın tüm kamera ve CPU Düğümlerini yok et
description.polish: Zniszcz wszystkie kamery i węzły procesora SHODAN
description.koreana: SHODAN의 카메라와 CPU 노드를 모조리 파괴하십시오
description.japanese: SHODANのカメラとCPUノードを全て破壊する

description.english: Find all Audio Logs and Data Sticks on Citadel Station
description.tchinese: 在要塞太空站上找到所有音訊日誌和資料碟

description.italian: Trova tutte le registrazioni e le unità di memoria della Stazione Citadel

description.spanish: Encuentra todos los registros de sonido y los stick de datos en Estación Ciudadela
description.russian: Найдите все аудиожурналы и накопители данных на станции Цитадель
description.turkish: Hisar İstasyonundaki tüm Sesli Günlükleri ve Veri Çubuklarını bul
description.polish: Znajdź wszystkie dzienniki audio i nośniki danych na stacji Cytadela
description.koreana: 우주 정거장 시타델 곳곳에 놓인 음성 기록과 데이터 스틱을 모두 찾아내십시오
description.japanese: シタデル・ステーション内の全てのオーディオログとデータスティックを発見する

description.turkish: Oyunu tamamla
description.polish: Ukończ grę

displayName.english: Don’t Forget To Salt The Fries
displayName.italian: Don’t Forget To Salt The Fries
displayName.brazilian: Não esqueça de salgar a batatinha
displayName.spanish: No olvides ponerles sal a las patatas
displayName.japanese: ポテトに塩を忘れるな

description.english: Complete the game on the highest difficulties
description.tchinese: 以最高難度通關遊戲

description.polish: Ukończ grę na najwyższych poziomach trudności

description.english: Discover a Hidden Door
description.tchinese: 發現一扇隱藏門

description.italian: Scopri una porta nascosta
description.brazilian: Descubra uma Porta Oculta

description.turkish: Gizli Kapı keşfet
description.polish: Znajdź ukryte drzwi

description.english: Jump across the big ramp in the Storage level
description.tchinese: 跳過儲藏樓層的大斜坡
description.german: Springe auf der Lagerebene über die große Rampe
description.italian: Oltrepassa con un salto la grande rampa nel livello Stoccaggio
description.brazilian: salte pela grande rampa no nível do Armazém
description.schinese: 跳过仓库层的大斜坡
description.spanish: Salta hasta el otro lado de la gran rampa en el nivel de Almacenamiento
description.russian: Перепрыгнуть большую рампу на Складской палубе
description.turkish: Depolama katında büyük rampadan karşıya zıpla
description.polish: Przeskocz przez dużą rampę na poziomie magazynowym
description.koreana: 스토리지 층에 있는 큰 경사로를 점프해서 건너십시오
description.japanese: 保管庫階層の大きな傾斜台を飛び越える

description.english: Solve the Chess Puzzle in Delta Grove
description.tchinese: 解開德爾塔生態莢中的西洋棋謎題
description.german: Löse das Schachrätsel im Delta-Hain
description.italian: Risolvi il rompicapo con gli scacchi nella Biosfera Delta
description.brazilian: Solucione o Enigma do Xadrez no Bosque Delta
description.schinese: 解决四区的象棋谜题
description.spanish: Soluciona todos los puzles de ajedrez en la arboleda Delta
description.turkish: Delta Korusu'ndaki Satranç Bulmacasını çöz
description.polish: Rozwiąż szachową łamigłówkę w gaju Delta
description.japanese: デルタグローヴでチェスのパズルを解く

description.english: Find the hidden Wrench. This looks familiar…
description.tchinese: 尋找隱藏扳手。這似乎有點眼熟...
description.german: Finde den versteckten Schraubenschlüssel. Das kommt mir bekannt vor …
description.italian: Trova la chiave inglese nascosta. Mi ricorda qualcosa...
description.brazilian: Encontre a Chave Inglesa escondida. Isto parece familiar…
description.schinese: 找到隐藏的扳手。这东西看起来很眼熟……
description.spanish: Encuentra la llave inglesa escondida. Esto me resulta familiar...
description.russian: Найти спрятанный гаечный ключ. Что-то в нем знакомо…
description.turkish: Gizli İngiliz Anahtarını bul. Bu tanıdık görünüyor…
description.polish: Znajdź ukryty klucz. To wygląda znajomo…
description.koreana: 숨겨진 스패너를 찾아내십시오. 어딘가 익숙한 느낌입니다...
description.japanese: 隠されたレンチを発見する。見覚えがある……

displayName.english: In the Not Too Distant Future
displayName.italian: In un futuro non troppo lontano...
displayName.spanish: En un futuro no muy distante

description.english: Find the hidden Audio Log
description.tchinese: 尋找隱藏音訊日誌

description.italian: Trova la registrazione nascosta

description.turkish: Gizli Sesli Günlüğü bul
description.polish: Znajdź ukryty dziennik audio

description.english: Find Skully, the Nightdive skull, on every level
description.tchinese: 找到每一層的 Nightdive 頭骨「骷髏」
description.german: Finde Skully, den Nightdive-Schädel, auf jeder Ebene
description.italian: Trova Skully, il teschio di Nightdive, in ogni settore
description.brazilian: Encontre Skully, a caveira da Nightdive, em todos os níveis
description.schinese: 在每个关卡中找到夜潜骷髅，小骨。
description.spanish: Encuentra a Skully, el cráneo de buceo nocturno, en todos los niveles
description.russian: Найдите Скалли, череп Nightdive, на каждом уровне
description.turkish: Her seviyede Nightdive kafatası Skully'yi bul
description.polish: Znajdź czaszkę Nightdive na każdym poziomie
description.koreana: 모든 층에서 개발사 Nightdive의 해골 마스코트인 Skully를 찾아내십시오
description.japanese: 全ての階層で骸骨っぽいNightdiveスカルを発見する
